comments:
Build ID: TPTP-4.4.0-200703090100

Steps To Reproduce:
Build : TPTP-4.4.0-200703090100
Import two CBE xml logs.
Verify that events are imported in the log views.
Create correlation(TIME) using these two logs.

Correlation can not be created.
Following exception get thrown.
